Question
========

One balanced die is rolled. We define the event *E* as the number of even eyes that come up. What then is the complement of *E*, if $\bar{E}$?

Answerlist
----------

* $\bar{E}$ = {the number of even eyes}
* $\bar{E}$ = {the number of odd eyes}
* $\bar{E}$ = {the total eyes}
* $\bar{E}$ = {0}

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* $\bar{E}$ = {the number of even eyes}: Incorrect
* $\bar{E}$ = {the number of odd eyes}: Correct
* $\bar{E}$ = {the total eyes}: Incorrect
* $\bar{E}$ = {0}: Incorrect
